name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a unique robot with an oscilloscope-themed design. It is a member of the WebtrES club, a group of robots dedicated to exploring the wonders of the digital world. With its vintage console box, classic buttons, cat-like arms and legs, and a red and black screen, RetroBot stands out among its robotic peers. Its retro aesthetic is a nod to the nostalgia of early technology and gaming. RetroBot possesses a variety of abilities and skills that make it a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
